critique: This document is a simple administrative order that adjusts the placement of certain positions within the Federal Executive Salary Schedule. It involves the Director and Deputy Director of the United States Secret Service, as well as the Assistant Archivist, Office of Presidential Libraries. There is no indication of ideological bias, immigration policy, executive power expansion or restriction, federalism implications, national security vs. civil liberties concerns, economic regulation, or social inclusion considerations. Therefore, all scores should be neutral.
